about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey to save the island nation of Yukrea in CRISIS Command, an action-packed platformer inspired by retro platformers like Mega Man and Blaster Master, where every battle shapes your destiny. As a C.A.R.E team member of CRISIS, face off against the dreaded masters of the sinister Dread Corps and steal their unique powers to turn the tide of battle. Each victory gives you new abilities to unleash against the forces of General Rend, as you fight to reclaim Yukrea from its oppressive invaders.

But your strength alone won’t be enough. Along the way, you’ll rescue trapped civilians, unlocking powerful upgrades and hidden abilities. The choices you make will determine the fate of an entire nation.

Immerse yourself in hand-crafted pixel art, and experience a nostalgic yet modern take on the platforming genre. With fast-paced combat, fun power-stealing mechanics, and a world teeming with secrets, CRISIS Command is a heart-pounding adventure that puts you at the center of a rebellion.

Can you defeat the Dread Corps and restore peace to Yukrea? The island's future is in your hands.

Features:

- Fast-paced platforming and intense combat that rewards strategy and skill! Slide, wall jump and blast through hordes of enemies

- Over 6 stages of action platforming. Decide your route towards victory!

- Steal unique powers from bosses and wield them in your fight against the Dread Corps

- Rescue civilians to unlock special abilities, hidden upgrades, and rewards

- Hand-drawn pixel art by a single developer, blending nostalgic charm with a modern flair
- Explore a detailed world filled with dangerous enemies, traps, and secrets

Search and Rescue for Yukrea's Future!

short_description: The peaceful island of Yukrea has been invaded by the evil Dread Corps! It's time to blast your way through over 6 stages of mayhem to rescue civilians and push those robots out. Use their own powers against them and help reclaim peace to the island.
